typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Contact as string,
		DepartmentID as integer,
		TA as decimal(18,2),
		DA as decimal(18,2),
		HRA as decimal(18,2),
		Others as decimal(18,2),
		Status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(GrossSalary = TA+DA+HRA+Others) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(ID==1) ~> Filter1
